data.message: Don't like it but I haven't liked most of your changes. You never listen to us.

replies.message: Hey, Mary. What about the new design would you like to see changed? Let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1emPQl3 -Leigh
a DISLIKE button. i know you have heard that before...
Just stop changing things. Stop it. Please just stop.

Make the right and left columns narrower especially the right one so that the middle column is easier to read. The print seems to be getting smaller and smaller A dislike button would be great. Always put the most recent on top. I seem to have to change that all the time.

um....   Mary, they gave you a link so you could provide them feedback.  Are you interested in them hearing you and possibly listening to your suggestion, or are you more interested in "sounding off" where your "peers" can see and pat you on the back for your "contributions".
Oh, yes, Kirstyn, cause FB has listened so many times in the past.  LOL
And I did also do it on the FB feedback.
Facebook feedback doesn't do squat!
Just stop changing it or at least fire whoever is in charge of it. It was fine before just go back

Why bother giving us the link to a feedback page when we KNOW you never listen to users? Facebook just likes knowing they can do whatever they want and we'll still use it.

I haven't received the update yet, but it looks stupid and no one has said anything good about it yet.
Facebook what's the point of leaving feedback when you don't listen that we don't like your changes. We want the current status
I'd like to see the old design back ASAP
Not crazy about the setup.. reminds me of "My Space"
Don't like it
Don't like it
Facebook - We are telling you - LEAVE IT ALONE!!!! Nobody likes it......HEAR US!  It used to be great...who cares about all the ads.  If I wanted to see those, I would watch more TV..
Hate it.
Aww...look at that.  FaceBook replied.  Like a politician...with a non-answer.  They haven't responded to a single one about the frickin' ads.  They'll just continue doing what they feel like.

U know now I know why people I know in California drop off face book they got tired of them keep changing thing and cut off some friend wow that suck so far no problem but I don't like the new stuff they did to this web page sorry but ya should have stay with the old yes I know someone in your office decide it would be better really well its not
Why, even bother - facebook is not listening.  I am just waiting till something better comes along then it is good by facebook!
I don't mind change!! BUT, could you at least ask what we think before you change??

FB, instead of telling people where to go to make a suggestion, why don't you just read the comments/complaints on your time line?  I think you have all the info you need to give people what they want.
The posts are way too big!!  I need to move my keyboard back about three feet from the monitor.  Do you think all of us need glasses?
PLEASE leave it to us if we would like to change to new design or keep the old design ! JUST THIS :v
